successes.title: SolarPuff: A Unique Little Solar Light
successes.description: Solarpuff is a little lantern with a HUGE impact. It is a patent pending solar powered lantern that packs flat and easily pops open.

Pledges.description: You get a Thank You Note and our Immense Gratitude!!
You get an origami star that glows in the dark. The little star inspired by Origami principles, along with our immense gratitude.

YOU GET 1 SolarHELIX!!!  One (1)SolarHELIX for YOU!
Early Bird Special!YOU ROCK!
You are making a big step in creating clean light for all!
You will GIVE one (1) SolarPuff to RMOF Orphanage in Haiti. RMOF.org is Reviel Matine Orphange Foundation where they provide a home and education to orphaned girls, in Haiti  .

YOU GET 1 SolarPuff!!!  One (1)SolarPuff for YOU!
Early Bird Special!
You are making a big step in creating clean light for all!
NEW NEPAL EARTHQUAKE RELIEF:  GIVE ONE:  To aid the Nepal people we've added a new reward.  Give one (1)  SolarPuff to Nepal Disaster Relief. Thank you.
YOU GET 2 SolarPuffs!!!  Two (2) SolarPuffs and our immense gratitude! You are making a big step in creating clean light for all!

YOU GET 1 SolarPuff GIVE 1 !!!  GET one and Give one SolarPuff and our immense gratitude! 
And the Girls at the Orphanage thank you!! You are making a HUGE step in creating clean light for all!

NEW NEPAL EARTHQUAKE RELIEF: GET ONE, GIVE ONE.  To aid the Nepal people we've added a new reward. Give one (1) to Nepal Disaster Relief and get one (1) for yourself. Do good, feel good. Thank you for your support.

YOU GET TWO= 1 SolarPuff + GET 1 SolarHelix !!!  GET one SolarPuff and one SolarHelix and our immense gratitude! 
You are making a HUGE step in creating clean light for all!

GET THREE+GIVE ONE= you GET two(2) SolarPuffs+ one (1) SolarHelix (prototype of the TPU version) and GIVE ONE(1) SolarHelix to the RMOF Orphanage, in your name. YOU are making a big impact! Energy free lighting saving a ton in carbon emissions!   As well as giving a light to help the girls at the orphanage have clean safe light!

NEW NEPAL EARTHQUAKE RELIEF
GET THREE+GIVE ONE= you GET two(2) SolarPuffs+ one (1) SolarHelix (prototype of the TPU version) and GIVE ONE(1) SolarPuff to the NEPAL Disaster Relief, in your name. YOU are making a big impact! Energy free lighting saving a ton in carbon emissions!   As well as giving a light to help the victims of the earthquake in Nepal.

GET THREE + GIVE TWO
GET THREE (3) SolarPuffs and GIVE TWO (2) SolarHelix to the RMOF Orphanage And our Immense gratitude!   YOU are making a HUGE difference to the environment and to those orphans!!!

NEW NEPAL EARTHQUAKE RELIEF 
GET THREE+GIVE TWO= you GET THREE SolarPuffs and GIVE TWO(2) SolarPuff to the NEPAL Disaster Relief, in your name. YOU are making a big impact! Energy free lighting saving a ton in carbon emissions!   As well as giving two lights to help the victims of the earthquake in Nepal.
GET SEVEN= Five(5) SolarPuffs + two (2) SolarHelix!!! You get 5 SolarPuffs + 2 SolarHelix!!! YOU ROCK our World with clean light, saving tons of carbon emissions! And our undying gratitude!
GET TEN (10) SolarPuffs!!  YOU get ten SolarPuffs-give them as gifts to friends and family or light up your patio.   Travel and camp with your SolarPuffs!! YOU are a WARRIOR of LIGHT!!!

GET TWENTY= Ten(10) SolarPuffs + Ten (10) SolarHelixs and our undying and immense gratitude!! We thank you.   YOU ARE OUR HEROS!!! Enjoy Carbon free Lighting for ALL!!! give as gifts and share them with your friends, children, and share the light!!!

NEW NEPAL EARTHQUAKE RELIEF:  GIVE ONE FULL BOX:  To aid the Nepal people we've added a new reward.  Give an entire box of SolarPuffs to Nepal Disaster Relief. You'll be sending useful aid to those that need it most right now.

TRIP TO HAITI!! YOU ARE an ANGEL of LIGHT!!!A trip for two (2) to Haiti (flight and 4 star hotel) for 3 days, 2 nights and spend a day touring the orphanage and Port au Prince with Alice Chun, the inventor of the SolarPuff and Helix. In addition you will be delivering one full box of SolarPuffs to the Orphanage in your name AND you will get a big, giant "Thank you" on our website and in all of our press releases and media as our ANGEL of Light!!!
